channel.title: Presentations on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in Presentations on Leonardo Borges

item.title: clouds against the floods presentation available
item.description: Last Tuesday I gave a short presentation on the whole Clouds Against the Floods thing at the Ruby on Rails Oceania User Group here in Sydney. Those guys are awesome and they recorded the talk - thanks guys! If you'd like to download the slides, they're available on Slideshare. Enjoy! ;)

item.title: presentation spring framework
item.description: Last friday I've done a small presentation about Dependency Injection and how it can improve the testing environment of a project. You can find it in the presentations page. Hope you like it.
